## Connect to GitHub: SSH key

#### Make sure you properly set up a SSH key to connect your local machine and GitHub account

You can follow instructions [here](https://youtu.be/RGOj5yH7evk?t=1231) and/or [here](https://docs.github.com/en/authentication/connecting-to-github-with-ssh/about-ssh)
